```{=html}
  <div id="successMessage" style="display: none; margin-top: 20px; padding: 15px; background-color: #d4edda; color: #155724; border: 1px solid #c3e6cb; border-radius: 4px;">

  </div>

  <div id="errorMessage" style="display: none; margin-top: 20px; padding: 15px; background-color: #f8d7da; color: #721c24; border: 1px solid #f5c6cb; border-radius: 4px;">
    Please fill in all required fields.
  </div>
</form>

<script>
document.getElementById('eventRegistrationForm').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
  e.preventDefault();
  
  // Get form data
  const formData = {
    fullName: document.getElementById('fullName').value,
    email: document.getElementById('email').value,
    phone: document.getElementById('phone').value,
    organization: document.getElementById('organization').value,
    position: document.getElementById('position').value,
    eventInterest: document.getElementById('eventInterest').value,
    experience: document.getElementById('experience').value,
    questions: document.getElementById('questions').value,
    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  // Validate required fields
  if (!formData.fullName || !formData.email || !formData.eventInterest || !formData.experience) {
    document.getElementById('errorMessage').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'none';
    return;
  }
  
  // Send to FormSubmit.co (free form backend)
  fetch('https://formsubmit.co/ajax/lugosemba@gmail.com', {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    },
    body: JSON.stringify(formData)
  })
  .then(response => {
    if (response.ok) {
      document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('errorMessage').style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById('eventRegistrationForm').reset();
    } else {
      document.getElementById('errorMessage').style.display = 'block';
      document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'none';
    }
  })
  .catch(error => {
    console.error('Error:', error);
    document.getElementById('errorMessage').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'none';
  });
});
</script>
```

### FAQ

**Q: What should I bring to a workshop?**
A: Please bring a laptop with R or Python installed. We'll provide all necessary datasets and materials.

**Q: Is there a registration fee?**
A: Most workshops are free for participants from partner institutions. Contact us for details.

**Q: How long are workshops?**
A: Workshops typically run from 2-4 hours, depending on the topic.

**Q: Do you provide certificates?**
A: Yes, completion certificates are provided for all workshops.

**Q: Can I attend remotely?**
A: Some workshops are held in person at SOAF-UDSM, while others are conducted online. Details will be provided upon registration.
